title: Best of The Herd for May 18, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 18, 2020
description:
It's better that Michael Jordan didn't come back with the Bulls to try and win a 7th title

Scottie Pippen was portrayed accurately despite what he says

Colin disagrees with some parts of a Jordan vs LeBron poll

Where Colin was right and wrong

Guest: Jerry West, 9x NBA Champion

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
